org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation

Interface ALSParams

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasCheckpointInterval, HasMaxIter, HasPredictionCol, HasRegParam, Identifiable, Params, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ALS, ALSModel

    public interface ALSParams
extends Params, HasMaxIter, HasRegParam, HasPredictionCol, HasCheckpointInterval
    Common params for ALS.
